Read:
0: OTA not started
1: waiting for data
2: working (can't receive data)
3: image valid
4: image fail

Write:
0: abort OTA
1: start OTA
2: finished writing
3: reboot
Write: Send the new firmware chunk by chunk in the correct order

All writes target this characteristic (00000003-D1D0-4B64-AFCD-2F977AB4A11D). All multi-byte values are little-endian (e.g. 0x00000001 → 01 00 00 00, 0x00000002 → 02 00 00 00).

Write 1: Send the Magic Code to unlock (4 bytes, little-endian).
0x16E975D0 → D0 75 E9 16, or 0xD075E916 → 16 E9 75 D0

Write 2 (after unlock), 4 bytes little-endian:
0x00000001: reboot → 01 00 00 00
0x00000002: nvs erase (factory reset) → 02 00 00 00. Note: when triggering nvs erase, the device will immediately reboot automatically.

Read: Returns the current RTC (7 bytes).
0: Seconds
1: Minutes
2: Hours
3: Days
4: Weekdays (sunday: 1 … saturday: 7)
5: Months
6: Years (only last two digits)
